text: Jack Blessing (July 29, 1951 - November 14, 2017) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as MacGillicuddy on Moonlighting and as Jack Powers in the sitcom George Lopez. He also had a role as Mr. Donner in the television series The Naked Truth. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. Blessing died of pancreatic cancer at his home in Chatsworth, California on November 14, 2017 at the age of 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Baltimore
title: Jack Blessing
